VarInfoVariables.Name: currentdate
VarInfoVariables.Description: current date

VarInfoVariables.Name: cumulTT
VarInfoVariables.Description: array of the different cumulTT to be saved in the calendar. The first element is the one used to advance the phenology

VarInfoVariables.Name: DayLength
VarInfoVariables.Description: length of the day

VarInfoVariables.Name: DeltaTT
VarInfoVariables.Description: daily delta TT . It is the same kind of TT as cumulTT[0]

VarInfoVariables.Name: GrainCumulTT
VarInfoVariables.Description: cumulTT used for the grain developpment

VarInfoVariables.Name: GAI
VarInfoVariables.Description: green area index

VarInfoVariables.Name: IsLatestLeafInternodeLengthPotPositive
VarInfoVariables.Description: true if the potential length of the latest leaf's internode is positive. Used to test for the beginning stem expension

VarInfoVariables.Name: Calendar
VarInfoVariables.Description: Dictionnary containing for each stage the date it occurs as well as a copy of all types of cumulated thermal times

VarInfoVariables.Name: LeafNumber
VarInfoVariables.Description: Actual number of phytomers

VarInfoVariables.Name: FinalLeafNumber
VarInfoVariables.Description: final leaf number

VarInfoVariables.Name: phase_
VarInfoVariables.Description: instance of the phase class . You can get the name of the phase using phase.getPhaseAsString(PhaseValue)

VarInfoVariables.Name: Phyllochron
VarInfoVariables.Description: Phyllochron

VarInfoVariables.Name: Vernaprog
VarInfoVariables.Description: progression on a 0 to 1 scale of the vernalization

VarInfoVariables.Name: HasFlagLeafLiguleAppeared
VarInfoVariables.Description: true if flag leaf has appeared (leafnumber reached finalLeafNumber)

VarInfoVariables.Name: MinFinalNumber
VarInfoVariables.Description: minimum final leaf number

VarInfoVariables.Name: hasLastPrimordiumAppeared
VarInfoVariables.Description: true if the last primordium has appeared

VarInfoVariables.Name: isMomentRegistredZC_39
VarInfoVariables.Description: true if ZC_39 is regitered in the calendar

VarInfoVariables.Name: cumulTTFromZC_39
VarInfoVariables.Description: cumul of the thermal time ( DeltaTT) since the moment ZC_39

VarInfoVariables.Name: cumulTTFromZC_91
VarInfoVariables.Description: cumul of the thermal time (DeltaTT) since the moment ZC_91

VarInfoVariables.Name: cumulTTFromZC_65
VarInfoVariables.Description: cumul of the thermal time (DeltaTT) since the moment ZC_65

VarInfoVariables.Name: currentZadokStage
VarInfoVariables.Description: current zadok stage see the definition of "GrowthStage" in the Phase class

VarInfoVariables.Name: hasZadokStageChanged
VarInfoVariables.Description: true if the zadok stage has changed this time step

VarInfoVariables.Name: tilleringProfile
VarInfoVariables.Description: store the amount of new tiller created at each time a new tiller appears

VarInfoVariables.Name: leafTillerNumberArray
VarInfoVariables.Description: store the number of tiller for each leaf layer

VarInfoVariables.Name: CanopyShootNumber
VarInfoVariables.Description: shoot number for the whole canopy

VarInfoVariables.Name: AverageShootNumberPerPlant
VarInfoVariables.Description: average shoot number per plant in the canopy

VarInfoVariables.Name: TillerNumber
VarInfoVariables.Description: number of tiller which have appeared

VarInfoVariables.Name: PTQ
VarInfoVariables.Description: Photothermal Quotient

VarInfoVariables.Name: Fixphyll
VarInfoVariables.Description: Phyllochron with sowing date fix

VarInfoVariables.Name: GAImean
VarInfoVariables.Description: Average GAI over TTWindowForPTQ thermal time periode

VarInfoVariables.Name: ListGAITTWindowForPTQ
VarInfoVariables.Description: List of daily GAI over TTWindowForPTQ thermal time period

VarInfoVariables.Name: PAR
VarInfoVariables.Description: Daily Photosyntetically Active Radiation

VarInfoVariables.Name: ListPARTTWindowForPTQ
VarInfoVariables.Description: List of Daily PAR during TTWindowForPTQ thermal time period

VarInfoVariables.Name: ListTTShootTTWindowForPTQ
VarInfoVariables.Description: List of Daily Shoot thermal time during TTWindowForPTQ thermal time period

VarInfoVariables.Name: pastGAI
VarInfoVariables.Description: Past Maximum GAI

Description.DomainTypeDescription: Domain class for the phenology component of Sirius Quality
